title: Computer Freeze
body: When I launch a match of League, my computer always ends up freezing around 1-3 seconds into the game. The only way I can fix everything is to force shut down my computer. I tested it out with other games and they don't cause any problems at all. This started happening to me since patch 6.18. Can anyone help me? :(

replies.body: Have you recently updated Windows?  An issue with the xbox game bar has been the cause of freezing like this.  Disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) for the fix!  Let me know if you have any questions!
awww. Thanks so much :D Now I can die happy :)

I had the same problem with the new Windows 10 update!

if you right click the League application and select "Test Compatibility" it will run a diagnostic and fix the problem for you!

:)
